page.title: 09A Day In My Life.
page.content: On a schoolday I get up at 7.30 a.m. and I get washed. I go back into my bedroom and get dressed. Then I go downstairs and make my breakfast. I go into the living room and watch television and eat my cornflakes. When I have finished my breakfast, I go down to the bus-stop and wait for the bus. When the bus comes I get my bus-pass out and show the bus driver. We travel 3 miles to Boynton school. First we do assembly and then handwriting. Then I do mathematics and English. I have my dinner at 12 o'clock and I go home at 3.30 p.m. When I get home I have my tea with my mother and sisters. Then I play out until 6.30 p.m. I watch television until 8.30 p.m. and then I get my pyjamas on. I have some supper and I go to bed.
